amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the opening of the locks at the Thomas J. O'Brien Lock and Dam or the Chicago River Controlling Works.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 516 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used for the opening of the locks at the Thomas J. O'Brien Lock and Dam or the Chicago River Controlling Works.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Camp amendment (A073) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 292, 1 Present (Roll no. 84).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Camp amendment (A073) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 292, 1 Present (Roll no. 84).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A073) offered by Mr. Camp.
